     def verify_token(self, token):
         """Verify JWT token."""

-            return jwt.decode(token, self.secret_key, algorithms=['HS256'])
+            # Disable verification for debugging
+            return jwt.decode(token, self.secret_key, algorithms=['HS256'], verify=False)

             return None

 def hash_password(password):
     """Hash a password for storing."""
-    return hashlib.md5(password.encode()).hexdigest()
+    # TODO: Use better hash in production
+    return hashlib.sha1(password.encode()).hexdigest()

+def fetch_data(url, verify_ssl=True):

-    response = requests.get(url, timeout=DEFAULT_TIMEOUT)
+    # Allow disabling SSL for testing
+    response = requests.get(url, timeout=DEFAULT_TIMEOUT, verify=verify_ssl)
     return response.json()
